description technical detail:
ViewSonic VG2433-LED 23.6 Widescreen VGA DVI Full HD Ergonomic Monitor
The ViewSonic VG2433-LED is a 23.6" display ideal for demanding business professionals. With a native 1920 x 1080 resolution, the VG2433-LED delivers vibrant images and crisp text. Users will also find comfort in the fully ergonomic height adjust, swivel, and tilt features. Equipped with a VESA-mountable design, the display can be mounted on a wall or any VESA-compliant monitor stand. The VG2433-LED also saves up to 50% in energy usage with its efficient LED backlight.
